item.StandardTibetan: 'phags pa dgongs pa'i rgyud gyi phreng ba chen po byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par nges pa chen po bstan pa las nor bu rin po che la mkhas pa bstan pa yongs su bsngo ba chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya baD
item.English84000: The King of Dedications, the Teaching on Skillfulness in the Great Jewel84000
item.tib: 'phags pa dgongs pa'i rgyud kyi phreng ba chen po byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par nges pa chen po bstan pa las nor bu chen po rin po che la mkhas pa bstan pa yongs su bsngo ba chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba
'phags pa dgongs pa'i rgyud kyi 'phreng ba chen po byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par nges pa chen po bstan pa las/ nor bu chen po rin po che la mkhas pa bsten pa yongs su sngo ba chen po'i rgyal po
'phags pa dgongs pa'i rgyud kyi 'phreng ba chen po byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par nges pa chen po bstan pa las nor bu chen po rin po che la mkhas pa bstan pa yongs su bsngo ba chen po'i rgyal po

'phags pa dgongs pa rgyud (kyi) phreng pa chen po byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par nges pa chen po bstand pa las / nor bu (chen po) rin po che (po) la mkhas pa bstand pa yongs su bstand pa / sngo ba chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba

'phags pa dgongs pa rgyud kyi 'phreng ba chen pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par nges pa chen po bstand pa las / nor bu chen po rin po che la mkhas pa bstand pa yongs su sngo ba chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba
'phags pa dgons pa'i brgyud kyi phreng ba chen po/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par nges pa chen po

'phags pa dgongs pa rgyud (kyi) phreng pa chen po byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par nges pa chen po bstand pa las/ nor bu (chen po) rin po che (po) la mkhas pa bstand pa yongs su bstand pa / sngo ba chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba / 'phags pa dgongs pa rgyud kyi 'phreng ba chen pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par nges pa chen po bstand pa las/ nor bu chen po rin po che la mkhas pa bstand pa yongs su sngo ba chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba
